show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
29 Seconds of Farcaster ... What did you miss this weekend?

* It was a @betrmint & @tipn weekend with week 1 of the $BETR allocation winding down--contests, 1 of 1 art bids, and other creative ways to tip. There are 30+ great intros of FCers with my 'Get To Know Me $BETR' giveaway. Great to read people's stories üíú 

* @colin announced a new Paragraph feature: 'remixing' that allows you to take someone's post and 'remix' it with your response or thoughts as your own post. This can expose you and the original author to each other's audience or help reluctant writers with a prompt to get started

* @chintan gave some helpful reflections on 5 weeks of TBA, including that 20% of people make money their first week & that social onboarding and simplicity produce results

* @livecaster continues to drive engagement in events, this week UFC and soccer. Bracky has been brought into the livecaster fold-- s/o @sayangel & @tldr for building up this fun way to engage & earn

* This Week In Mini Apps featured betrmint & @scratch mini apps | https://farcaster.xyz/linda/0x8ff48370

* /gmfarcaster is on at 11:30 AM EST with @adrienne & @nounishprof Monday shenanigans & news to catch up and get you ready for the week üíú

cast.text:
GM Farcaster back tomorrow at a west coast friendly 11:30 am ET/8:30 am PT. We'll be chatting up all the Farcaster and Base App news and covering all your favorite builders. 

Join @adrienne and I on YouTube, Twitter or watch in the @gmfarcaster mini app. We'll see you in the GM!

https://www.youtube.com/live/mpfHnBOu-18?si=fJBkncf6XfaFPnCc

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
Swaps now succeed 96.8% of the time (in addition to completing in 2.5s)

Some of these are due to (intentional) slippage settings which prevent a trade from going through if the price has moved too much. All other issues, we're going to keep fixing. 

Big shoutout to @slokh for improving the reliability of swaps!

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
The average time to swap in our wallet is 2.5s! 

H/t to @deodad @slokh and the base team for building flashblocks

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
It‚Äôs been 5 weeks since the @baseapp.base.eth beta launched at New Day 1.

Since then, we‚Äôve thoughtfully onboarded over 30K people. Here‚Äôs what we‚Äôve learned so far üßµ

üß† Key Learnings
‚Ä¢ Clear entry points for earning are critical
‚Ä¢ When people understand HOW rewards work, they engage more.
‚Ä¢ Social onboarding > wallet funding
‚Ä¢ More jargon can be killed (‚Äúslippage‚Äù, ‚Äúmarketcap‚Äù, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Simple, focused, and delightful mini-apps beat complex ones

üëÄ Behaviors We‚Äôre Seeing
‚Ä¢ Over 20% of people earn in week 1, just by making content
‚Ä¢ Posting ‚Üí instant $ feels magical to people used to traditional social
‚Ä¢ Friend clusters through chat and invites lead to more engagement
‚Ä¢ AI agents + group chats unlock multiplayer magic
‚Ä¢ Social discovery is alpha. People want coins from friends or creators they know.
‚Ä¢ Alpha signals (top holders, volume spikes) drive buys

Cont‚Äôd

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
That's a wrap on ETHGlobal NYC! As always, I'm walking away SO energized and optimistic, full of gratitude to meet and jam with so many talented onchain builders

If you're not on the ground, you're not in the game - Coinbase Developer Platform and Base live and breathe that.

Quick rundown of our four $5K prize winners (more from our main CDP handle on these awesome builders tomorrow):

üõí Primer: Browser extension adding crypto checkout to Amazon; also an ETHGlobal Finalist 

üìÑ PDFi: Embed wallets and onchain payments natively in PDF docs

‚ö° x402-flash: 20x latency improvement on x402 payments; also an ETHGlobal Finalist 

üü¶ LaunchBase: Frictionless crypto investing for bringing a billion users onchain, on Base

We learned a ton about how we can make CDP even more powerful for onchain builders. There is *no* substitute for this direct feedback.

Grateful to everyone who came out and built with us - builders and creators are going to bring the world onchain.

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
Right after seeing my cast, @samantha sent me $10 for airplane snacks out of nowhere. How cute is she? As soon as she did this, my flight got ready for takeoff. She‚Äôs obviously magic.

I have never met Sam IRL, but I have observed her quiet, humble kindness countless times in the Farcaster community. She truly embodies the name of her brand - Humankind.

In that spirit, I‚Äôd like to gift one of her beautiful candles to someone in the community who embodies this too. Tag someone by Sunday and share about how they make Farcaster a more human, more kind place.

I‚Äôll pick one of your suggestions to receive a Humankind candle of the recipient‚Äôs choosing.

cast.text:
I wrote ‚Äúwhile in LA‚Äù in my previous cast as if my presence in LA were in the past tense. But I‚Äôm actually still at LAX, sitting inside a plane which should have landed in SF over an hour ago.

A series of misfortunate events occurred:

- First, the fire extinguisher on board needed to be replaced.

- After we got a new fire extinguisher, a flight attendant cut her finger in the galley and paramedics took her off the flight.

- After we got a new flight attendant and began taxiing, we received a new weather report from a very foggy SFO delaying our takeoff.

There aren‚Äôt any more flights on this airline back tonight, so there‚Äôs a chance I might be stuck in LA tonight. I think these events are happening because I drank the entirety of this ‚Äúchocho superfood‚Äù Erewhon smoothie earlier. A cursed elixir brewed to trap tourists.

How do I reverse the curse?

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
** Get To Know Me $BETR Giveaway **

I'm giving away 200,000 $BETR split to 6 winning FCers who write a nice intro cast of themselves. This is inspired by @afrochicks & @chronist yesterday, quoted below. They are the standard & are automatically entered.

How It Works: 

1. Quote cast this cast, this one, right here, that you are reading 
2. Put 'Get To Know Me $BETR' in your cast
3. Write a nice intro of yourself. If you write a couple of generic things, I won't include it in the giveaway. Pictures TOTALLY optional. Just do a good job of telling us a bit about yourself

* I will pick (2) winners that each get 50,000 $BETR (based on quality)
* Randomly pick (4) winners that each get 25,000 $BETR

Deadline: Monday 3PM EST, & I will announce winners Monday night & then tip the winners their share

Getting to know people $BETR builds community, let's fill the feed with great intros! üíú (Bonus: it gives you something to cast that people will like and engage with and maybe even tip you some $BETR too)

https://farcaster.xyz/afrochicks/0xa2ca3c6a
https://farcaster.xyz/chronist/0xaefe9818

cast.text:
quick reintroduction and some lore:

- hi i am naomi i am a professional triple jumper (my highest ranking was 12th in the world)
 
- i got two injuries and had two surgeries in 2023 and 2024 but won the national champs for the 11th time last year

- i am aiming to compete in the 2028 LA olympics i took a break this year after my grandad went to hospital (he is still in hospital) and i got burned out (im not burned out now tho and ready to start again soon) 

- i make video content and post here because i love the community here + i have also been grinding and saving to fund my athletics for my next season

- i have close to 50k followers on tiktok but dont post on there üßçüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è 

- i love matcha, not because its a trend but because i have adhd and it helps me to focus without anxiety i created /gmatcha and its my fave channel ever 

- i am married to kev aka @metzmusic who is a 400m athlete and music producer we‚Äôve been married for almost 4 years!!!

- my younger and only brother @natogb3  is a professional footballer

- my ethnicity is nigerian and jamaican but both of my parents were born in england and i havent been to nigeria but would love to go

- i have a degree in politics and statistics

[Sound ONüîä] 

Hi, I‚Äôm Chronist, and that's what you need to know about me: 

- I‚Äôm a scientist working with electric discharges (plasma), and a neon artist. In short: I make neon stuff wherever I can.

- My art is experimental and multidisciplinary. Photos, videos, drawings, AI, and generative art. All of these are blended inside TouchDesigner.

- I define my style as neon retrofuturism. Statues, CRT monitor aesthetics, emulated paintings, and other analog relics interact seamlessly with neon lines and futuristic elements.

- Most of my collections are on Base.

- Sometimes I post science-related stuff. 

- I also run the Neon Club, where holders of my $NEON coin and artworks are rewarded periodically.

This video is a glimpse of my art from recent months. 

My journey is a chronicle, neon is my language, and this is my story.

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
Some thoughts / advice on mini app and general safety in case helpful

1. We have automatic transaction scanning within mini apps that prevents dangerous ‚Äúsend me all your money‚Äù attacks

2. Be skeptical when approving significantly more balance than necessary for a transaction, especially if asking for all. You can always use the Smol Frame mini app made by @horsefacts.eth for revoking contract approvals

3. Check the creator of the mini app. If something feels off, it's completely okay to be skeptical and double check things. Even if you know the user, individual accounts can get compromised or the username could be a slight edit of it to look similar (common attacks that extend to outside of Farcaster and outside of crypto)

4. Feel free to send me malicious/imposter accounts on Farcaster that should be nerfed

https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/bzs-XgtfmjIw/smol-frame

html.ogDescription: Simple, smart and elegant dapps, designed to make your crypto journey a little bit easier.

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
Lesson learned: take the paved road.

Will happily go back to the unpaved road of miniapps but for building admin tools that have no farcaster requirement and no need for distribution, using next-auth and google libraries made this so much easier.

cast.text:
Is anyone very familiar with AuthKit and SIWF who is available sometime in the next few days to answer a few questions? 

I am building a web app that I want limited to certain FIDs. I have the basic SIWF working for authentication but I‚Äôm getting confused about how to restrict access to content and APIs based on FID.  I can‚Äôt add the check on the client side bc that‚Äôs not secure, and even if the check happens on the backend, anyone can change the FID being passed into the API. I was looking at the server side auth and custom sign in buttons but got stuck‚Ä¶ and I‚Äôm wondering if I‚Äôm overthinking over complicating this.  Another question I have is whether authentication in miniapps are inherently more secure and harder to spoof than web apps?

going to be an incredible day

show_title: Hide Your L‚Äôs, Not Your Casts: GM Farcaster ep278
text:
fc culture is built on

>giving more than taking
>trying other ppl‚Äôs things instead of only self promotion
>dialogue over stubborn bs
>sharing anything u find interesting instead of sticking to one niche

time and time again this works for new ppl, fc breathes realness, there‚Äôs no ‚Äúplaybook‚Äù just be yourself
